definitions.definition: The act of acclimatizing; the process of inuring to a new climate, or the state of being so inured .
The climatic adaptation of an organism that has been moved to a new environment.

main_definition: The act of acclimatizing; the process of inuring to a new climate, or the state of being so inured .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) The climatic adaptation of an organism that has been moved to a new environment.
